Name: 卢沟桥事变
About the game: Fight against foreign enemies! This strategy game focuses on simulating the Chinese battlefield after the Lugouqiao Incident in 1937. Players can choose one of the two major forces in China when they were in the military, decide on the advance and retreat of the army, national government affairs, and diplomatic relations, and unite with all possible partners to unite against the invasion. Japanese Army. Whether it is the same as history, or beyond history, depends on your decision. Feature Map: Hexagonal 3D maps with different heights made according to the real terrain; Government affairs: You can obtain popular support and indicator bonuses by issuing various government affairs decisions; Army: It simulates the formation of the army at all levels, and the lowest level can be operated to a company-level unit; Battle: The map has subdivisions to simulate the local terrain, and the army will conduct tactical battles on the subdivisions; Strategy: According to the military quality of the commander and officers and soldiers, the army will use various methods to execute the order.
Meta Title: 卢沟桥事变: Jan 27, 2023, 文墨 and Full Overview
